Rhema Christian Services Foundation Application 2025, How to register online for Rhema Christian Services Foundation 2025,  Rhema Christian Services Foundation courses, Fees, Prospectus

 

An online admission application and registration form/dates for the 2025 academic year have been released by the management of the Rhema Christian Services Foundation.

Rhema Christian Services Foundation online application is ongoing;

  • First-time applicants to the Rhema Christian Services Foundation
  • New qualifications and/or specializations for students
  • Candidates who applied for admission but were not offered a space or who were offered a space and took it but did not register
  • A student who completes a higher certificate or any other programme and wishes to continue with further undergraduate studies

How to Register Online for Rhema Christian Services Foundation Application 2025

For Rhema Christian Services Foundation Online Registration, you will need the following items:

  • A valid email account
  • The South Africa identification number
  • Students from abroad need a passport

Please CLICK HERE to register for Rhema Christian Services Foundation 2025
